articles.author: Elsa Keslassy
articles.title: New Dwayne Johnson Wax Figure Unveiled as Paris Museum Admits Original Was ‘Whiter Than It Should Have Been’ and an ‘Honest Mistake’ - Variety
articles.description: As Dwayne Johnson's updated wax figure is unveiled at Musée Grévin, a museum exec talks the 'honest mistake' of making his skin color too light.
articles.content: France’s Musée Grévin took Dwayne Johnson‘s comments and social media outcry over the star’s botched wax figure to heart. Within 24 hours, his figure was updated by artists who gave it a slightly dar… [+3006 chars]
